channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole, 16th January
item.description:
Large pothole middle of the road. Potentially to damage vehicles as easily felt.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Amersham Road, New Cross, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Entire middle of the slip road damaged by forming potholes., 16th January
item.description:
Coming from Crossway to to the elevated roundabout on the slip road heading towards Erith. The entire length of the slip road is damaged down the center with pot holes forming and getting larger.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crossway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 x bins need emptying on open space nr Annandale Rd, 16th January
item.description:
4 x bins need emptying on open space nr Annandale Rd - 2 x refuse bins and 2 dog poo bins have not been emptied for many months. The open space is between Annandale Rd & Oakland Ave, Sidcup
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Shuttle Close, Blackfen, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over filled green bin, 16th January
item.description:
We had this problem before. No 7 Holly hill bin gets used as a dumping ground. Bin falls over and foxes do the rest pulling rubbish apart everywhere. It has been like this since before the New year.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Erith Road, Lessness Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nuts missing - Hoblingwell playground, 16th January
item.description:
On the larger climbing frame: Two captive nuts, under the platform to secure the vertical red panels have sheared off. Please could these be replaced?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leesons Way, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipping Blocking Pavement Greenwich Quay, 16th January
item.description:
Fly-Tipping Block Pavement Continuation of "FixMyStreet ref: 8639561" (which disappeared from FixMyStreet despite remaining a "clear & present issue" Refuse / rubbish is being carelessly "dumped" in the bin-store, and specifically IS NOT being securely disposed in the skips. The Skips have been emptied but are blocked by fly-tipped rubbish-debris. Together with a Fly-Tipped fridge-freezer, and a "brainlessly dumped" Lime Bike, has now blocked the footpath. This has been an ongoing problem for several years, and local residents deserve a permanent solution please.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Creek Road, Deptford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive potholes with sharp metal, 16th January
item.description:
Two large potholes. One very dangerous with sharp metal exposed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Porters Way, Friern Barnet, Greater London

item.title: Dog mess, 16th January
item.description:
I reported this yesterday, you say it is fixed. It is not! The mess is still outside all 3 houses no 6, 8 &22. Please fix this today.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Crampton Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bed Fly Tipped on Truman’s Road, 16th January
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salcombe Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Street Light not working, in front of 77 New St hill, 16th January
item.description:
I would like to inform you that the street light has not been working for over three months. This light is important for safety, as it illuminates the area and allows residents and neighbours to walk after dark without security concerns. (Exact location: 77 New St Hill, golf course side of the road)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Street Hill, Sundridge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big pot hole/overflowing drain, 16th January
item.description:
Dip in road in the middle of the bus lane heading to the bus stop. As seen in photo, looks like a big pot hole or sunken road surface around the drain. Lots of pooling water.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Croydon Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A number of potholes including a very large pothole, 16th January
item.description:
A number of potholes including a very large pothole which seems to have been reported in October but still no action to repair potholes. All are in the stretch of Crockenhill road heading to St Mary Cray just inside Bromley Borough and before 30 mph speed limit sign. The volume of traffic including lorries & buses and weather will increase the size of potholes until repaired. This can't wait until new budgets.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crockenhill Road, St Mary Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
